 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂמאֹל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂמאֹול‎</span> ([[BDB#Baer|Baer]]<sup>[[Josh.1.7|Josh 1:7]]</sup>)<sub>54</sub> **noun [masculine]** ==the left== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šumêlu;***</u></abbr> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (also <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***north wind***); Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שמאל‎</span>, Palmyrene (suffix) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סמלך‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; √ dubious, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שאם‎</span> + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 128</sup> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>A. u. A. i. (1892), 21</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 148, 405</sup>; (see also [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Dietr|Dietr]]<sup>Wortforschung 234</sup>), compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be unlucky***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***left***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***north***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שאם‎</span> ***north, unlucky*** [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Epigr. Denkm. 29; Epigr. Denkm. Arabic Nos. 6. 7</sup>; other views in [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 299</sup> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 116</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂמאֹל‎</span> abs, [[Gen.13.9|Gen 13:9]] +, construct [[Gen.48.13|Gen 48:13]]; [[2Kgs.23.8|2Kgs 23:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂמאֹול‎</span> absolute [[Num.20.17|Num 20:17]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂמאֹלֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[2Sam.2.21|2Sam 2:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂמאֹלוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.48.13|Gen 48:13]] +, etc.; — opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמִין‎</span> except [[Gen.14.15|Gen 14:15]]; [[Judg.19.27|Judg 19:27]]; [[2Kgs.23.8|2Kgs 23:8]] — 

**1.** ***left***, region on the left, [[Gen.13.9|Gen 13:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); ***on the left*** is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלשּֿׂ‎</span> [[2Kgs.23.8|2Kgs 23:8]]; [[Ezek.16.46|Ezek 16:46]]; [[Zech.4.3|Zech 4:3]]; [[Zech.4.11|Zech 4:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהַֿשּׂ‎</span> [[1Chr.6.29|1Chr 6:29]] compare [[2Chr.18.18|2Chr 18:18]], also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשּׂ‎</span> (***a sinistra***) [[Exod.14.22|Exod 14:22]]; [[Exod.14.29|Exod 14:29]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[2Sam.16.6|2Sam 16:6]] + 7 t. + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִהַשּׂ‎</span> [[2Chr.3.17|2Chr 3:17]]; [[Ezek.1.10|Ezek 1:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִשׂ‎</span> [[Eccl.10.2|Eccl 10:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> alone [[Job.23.9|Job 23:9]] ***toward the left*** is <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלשֿׂ‎</span> [[Gen.24.49|Gen 24:49]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Sam.2.21|2Sam 2:21]]; [[Zech.12.6|Zech 12:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהַֿשּׂ‎</span> [[2Sam.2.19|2Sam 2:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> alone [[1Sam.6.12|1Sam 6:12]]; [[Isa.9.20|Isa 9:20]] + 13 t. 

**2.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַדשֿׂ‎</span> ***left hand***, [[Judg.3.21|Judg 3:21]]; [[Judg.7.20|Judg 7:20]], so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂ‎</span> alone [[Gen.48.18|Gen 48:18]]; [[Gen.48.13|Gen 48:13]]; [[Gen.48.14|Gen 48:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Judg.16.29|Judg 16:29]]; [[Ezek.39.8|Ezek 39:8]]; [[Jonah.4.11|Jonah 4:11]]; [[Prov.3.16|Prov 3:16]]; [[Dan.12.7|Dan 12:7]]; [[Song.2.6|Song 2:6]]; [[Song.8.3|Song 8:3]]. 

**3.** = ***north*** (on ***left*** of one facing east, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָחוֺר‎</span> **d**, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָמִין‎</span> **4**, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶדֶם‎</span> **1** b) [[Gen.14.15|Gen 14:15]]; [[Josh.19.27|Josh 19:27]]([[BDB#P|P]]); of. [[Ezek.16.46|Ezek 16:46]].
